Thnx for all this work rossirep!!If there is anything to make it up to you,let me know!

Its up to you if you want to wipe the lot just for the 727,  I like to keep fs9 nice and tidy, and re-install quite often....  messing with code i dont really understand, has been a catalyst for a few re-installs too!
@ PHFBO  yes this has the 727 super model in.
Hopefully this one will work for me. :)

@ cmb228

if you had the original file i upped'....  that also will work on a fresh install of fs9...   its all very bizzare i cant understand what might be making it crash out on older installs of fs9. 

Dont shoot me if it doesnt work,  but i can say 100% it works with the method described above.

wye: Why don't you do a fucking search before you post requests? And thanks so much for linking directly to the page - that helps all of us a lot, really.
